Item.Name: BB Gun
Item.Description: Unless you're hunting tin cans in space, this weapon is pretty useless.

Item.Name: Machine Gun
Item.Description: Better than a BB Gun, but you still won't be doing a lot of damage out there.

Item.Name: Battering Ram
Item.Description: Who needs weapons when you can just ram the other ships?

Item.Name: Repair Robots
Item.Description: Floating micro robots that will slowly repair the structural integrity of your ship's hull.

Item.Name: Armor I
Item.Description: Take more of a beating with this upgraded hull armor.

Item.Name: Thrusters I
Item.Description: Dodge bullets, lasers, and missiles with the increased agility your ship gains from these thrusters.
